full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Multiple VICTORIA Class Spares: Valves, Studs, Gauges and Wire

**Reference ID:** PW-23-01029304
**Solicitation ID:** W8482-230399/B

#### Request for Proposal Details

* **Publication Date:** March 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 19, 2023 (2:00 PM)
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Procurement Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires the delivery of the following VICTORIA Class spares to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax:

* Item 1: BALL VALVE, GSIN: 4810, NSN: 99-5418818 (Quantity: 3, Unit of Issue: EA)
* Item 2: BALL VALVE, GSIN: 4810, NSN: 99-5418818 (Quantity: 3, Unit of Issue: EA)
* Item 3: BALL VALVE, GSIN: 4810, NSN: 99-7289412 (Quantity: 18, Unit of Issue: EA)
* Item 4: BALL VALVE, GSIN: 4810, NSN: 99-7289412 (Quantity: 1, Unit of Issue: EA)
* Item 5: SEAT ASSEMBLY,VALVE, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 99-5286510 (Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA)
* Item 6: SEAT ASSEMBLY,VALVE, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 99-5286510 (Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA)

#### Substitution and Equivalent Products

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number, as well as the NCAGE.

#### Documents and Language

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Darrell Hill, darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca

#### Attachments

The solicitation package includes the following documents:

* [Contracting Authority Email Address](mailto:darrell.hill@forces.gc.ca) for requests or additional information.
* A Line 5 of the solicitation package, which includes the solicitation documents, bid forms and any other supplementary documents.
